Director of Comms, @web3jp, talks about collaborations, what W3F does & the Web3 tech stack. 

In order to build a better web, W3F will help coordinate & fund teams efforts working towards this common goal of a better web as outlined in our tech stack.

1118902408262901761.text: Imagine your mom opening up her wallet and getting in on a predication market, backing up tokens in her Safe, or playing a game without knowing it even runs on-chain. I think this will happen soon, but we need to make the Burner more extensible:  https://medium.com/gitcoin/burner-modules-c6737cf06fe …

1119300281592737793.text: Regular reminder: We have not yet published a mobile app publicly, so anything claiming to be MetaMask on a public mobile app store currently should be considered a phishing attempt.

1120646255250636805.text:
blown away by the stats from @ETHCapeTown:

- 69% of hackers were from South Africa (!)
- 42% of hackers were new to ethereum, another 15% were beginners
- 144 hackers attended, 32 hacks submitted

find all the hacks here https://ethcapetown.devpost.com
